verbose_text: In this study, we proved that docetaxel induces cytoprotective autophagy in PC3 and DU145 cells by activation of C-Jun N-terminal kinase (JNK) and then induces the phosphorylation of Bcl-2, then disruption of Bcl-2 / Beclin1 complex and finally release of Beclin1.
evidence: docetaxel induces cytoprotective autophagy in PC3 and DU145 cells by activation of C-Jun N-terminal kinase(JNK)and then induces the phosphorylation of Bcl-2
